name: A Gift for December
description:
A game made for Secret Santa Jam 2021. December brings me no luck.

Controls

- WASD/arrow keys to move

- Backspace to restart the level

- Spacebar to jump/continue dialogue

Credits

- BGM/SFX: Fesliyan Studios

- Free assets used in the project: AllSkyFree, Holiday Kit, Platformer Kit, Food Kit, Graveyard Kit, Castle Kit
